subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Texas point guard J’Covan Brown said he did not write profane Twitter posts under his account that complained about being pulled from the No. 3 Longhorns’ win over Oklahoma.
snippet: Texas point guard J’Covan Brown said he did not write profane Twitter posts under his account that complained about being pulled from the No. 3 Longhorns’ win over Oklahoma.
